body:
Hi, I'm CakeyLogic I recently was looking for a cool server because the server I played on shut down. I played on it for 3 years and you know it really is hard trying to find a new server after a server you played on for 3 years shut down. I found this server just searching up Minecraft servers, and I love it. I recently joined today and i have been spectating some games because im in exams. I have'nt experienced the server fully yet but I'm planning on doing so. I am 15 years old currently and I live in the Bahamas.

I would like to say I love the combat games and system. I love this server mostly because it has no lag and the community is great. i would like to thank you for letting public players join the server and I know I will play here for a long time :D.

title: CakeyLogic

But just wait until you get in game. Than the block lag is real.
